<xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="181" y="61"><field name="trigger">player_wakes_up</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_negate"><value name="BOOL"><block type="entity_has_achievement"><field name="achievement">CUSTOM:DreamOn</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_add_achievement"><field name="achievement">CUSTOM:DreamOn</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">/give @p written_book{pages:['{"text":"Hello, wanderer of dreams
